meanings.definition: A type of adhesive that bonds quickly and strongly.
meanings.sent1: The cyanoacrylates sealed the broken vase back together in seconds.
meanings.sent2: I used cyanoacrylates to fix my favorite mug.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally glued its paws together with cyanoacrylates.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was like cyanoacrylates, always there to mend any situation.
meanings.sent5: The cyanoacrylates acted like magic glue, instantly sticking things in place.
